db--table--sql: ecology-- -- select data_type, count(*) cnt from information_schema.COLUMNS c
             where table_schema='ecology' group by data_type order by cnt desc;

db--table--sql: information_schema-- -- select data_type, count(*) cnt from information_schema.COLUMNS c
             where table_schema='information_schema' group by data_type order by cnt desc;

db--table--sql: mysql-- -- select data_type, count(*) cnt from information_schema.COLUMNS c
             where table_schema='mysql' group by data_type order by cnt desc;

db--table--sql: performance_schema-- -- select data_type, count(*) cnt from information_schema.COLUMNS c
             where table_schema='performance_schema' group by data_type order by cnt desc;

db--table--sql: sys-- -- select data_type, count(*) cnt from information_schema.COLUMNS c
             where table_schema='sys' group by data_type order by cnt desc;
